column4: Over night something happened with my ubuntu, i turned on this morning and my sound doesnt work, and i cant access automatix i get this message "Failed to run /usr/bin/automatix.py jon /home/jon 1000  as user root."
you might be using a different kernel than you were yesterdayd
i was wondering why i cant access it....i dont think that it is the problem i think my OS is the problem
try rebooting and seeing if there's an older kernel you can boot into, and see if that works
